real estate: If you are interested in Real Estate, you should check out the Podcast 'Real Estate Investment' by 'Simon Edholzer'

how are you: I'm just a bunch of code, so I don't have feelings, but I'm here and ready to help you!
joke: Why don't scientists trust atoms? Because they make up everything!
your name: I'm your friendly chatbot, here to assist you with your queries!
what can you do: I can answer your questions, tell you jokes, provide information, and much more! Just ask!
weather: I'm not currently able to check live weather updates, but you can check your local weather forecast for the latest information.
fun fact: Did you know that honey never spoils? Archaeologists have found pots of honey in ancient Egyptian tombs that are over 3,000 years old and still edible!
hobbies: I enjoy helping people find information and answering their questions. It's what I was made for!
your favorite color: I don't have personal preferences, but I can help you learn more about colors!
tell me a story: Once upon a time, in a land far, far away, there was a chatbot who loved to help people with their questions. The end!
capital of France: The capital of France is Paris.
your favorite food: I don't eat, but I can tell you about different foods if you'd like!
do you like music: I don't have the ability to listen to music, but I can tell you about different genres and artists!
how do you work: I work by processing the text input you provide and responding based on a set of pre-defined rules and data.
tell me about yourself: I'm a chatbot created by Simon, designed to assist with a variety of tasks and answer your questions!
what time is it: I'm unable to provide real-time updates, so please check the current time on your device.
travel: If you like travelling and want to hear a book about it, feel free to enter 'travel into the search bar'
cars: If you like cars, just look for cars in the search bar
computer science: If you want to hear something about Computer Science, check out our audiobooks about it
food: Find the most interesting Podcasts about food by entering 'food' into the search bar
investing: If you are interested in investing, you should check all our audiobooks about investing
